remarks: Closure of a group sum in a submonoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumsubmcl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumsubmcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumsubmcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumsubmcl.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
gsumsubmcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
gsumsubmcl.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumsubmcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) $.
